name: SenkuMusic
subtitle: Premium Local Music Player with Acid Design

apps.name: SenkuMusic
apps.subtitle: Premium Local Music Player
apps.localizedDescription:
A beautiful, premium local music player for iOS with advanced organization and seamless device synchronization.

‚ú® Features:
- üé® Premium Design: Apple Music-inspired UI with dynamic themes and glassmorphism.
- üéµ Powerful Player: Background playback, Lock Screen controls, and Dynamic Island support.
- üìö Smart Library: Automatic metadata extraction and organized views.
- ‚öôÔ∏è Advanced: File transfer, Keep Screen Awake, and more.

privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: Aura needs access to the local network to share songs with nearby friends.
